column4: Hey I have a question about getting a windows gaming program to work on linux can somoene tell me what I need to do this?
what is the program?
it works with wine
http://www.linux-gamers.net/modules/wfsection/article.php?articleid=32
and youll need cedega cvs, that can be built for free: http://www.linux-gamers.net/modules/wfsection/article.php?articleid=45
just follow the howtos, you should be fine
do you know how to use synaptic?
do you have universe?
i think all the files are on universe. which ones you dont find?
i have bison, bison++ and bison-1.35
just in case, install all of them :)
check the repositories
in the section you should have "main restricted universe multiverse"
correct
look for xlibmesa
im not sure, so its better if you try to build it and see if there are any errors
you should restart x after installing the drivers :)
im not sure if cs source runs in linux...
awe it has to!
im afraid it wont run :(
what about third party games like natural selection?
cs, hl, dod, etc, runs ok
yes, eventually
